definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Sa 6:4 only pl. tumours, result of dysentery (v. Aram. √) (so Aram. [[טְחוֹרַיׇּא]], t.h.uwro0)—chiefly Qr for Kt [[עפלים]], [[עפלֵי]] hemorrhoids: viz. [[טְחׂרִים]] De 28:27, 1Sa 5:6, 1Sa 5:9, 1Sa 5:12; [[טְחׂרֵי זֶהָב]] 1Sa 6:4; [[חַלְמֵי טְחׂרֵיכֶם]] 1Sa 6:5; twice it has found its way into the Kt [[טְחׂרֵי הַזׇּהָב]] 1Sa 6:17, [[חַלְמֵי טְחׂרֵיהֶם]] 1Sa 6:11; We:Sam. 27n., cf. Gei:Urschrift 408 f.
